name: Minesweeper Puzzle HD
description:
Who said Minesweeper has to be grey and boring? Brought to you by GreyHeadStudio, enjoy a colorful variety of vibrant HD graphics of an all-time classic.

Your goal is to open up all fields that don't contain mines without exploding by clicking on a field with a mine underneath it. Test your logical thinking skills and don't blow up!

FEATURES:

*Choose out of 3 difficulty levels: Easy (9X9), Medium (16X16), and Pro (30X16)

*A fun and vivid pixel style design

*Tutorial Window

*Sound effects can be enabled

*Restart a level at any time

*Results window

Questions? Contact our support team! feedback@greyheadstudio.com

We appreciate all feedback we can get :)

Good luck!
